text: Kwangaloo ndlela Sabavusa khon’ukuze babuzane. Omnye osisithethi kubo wathi: “Lingakanani na ithuba nihleli (apha)?” Bathi bona: “Sihleli (mhlawumbi) imini okanye inxalenye yemini.” Bathi: “INkosi yakho yiYo Eyazi ngcono ukuba lingakanani na ithuba silapha. Ngoko ke thumelani omnye wenu aye esixekweni nemali eyingqekembe akhangele kananjalo okokuba kukuphi na okona kutya kulungileyo anokuniphathela kona, alumke kananjalo. Niqiniseke ke ukuba akukho mntu uniqaphelayo
